Title: Oman LNG seals supply agreement with trading arm of Thailand’s PPT
Description: PTT International Trading signed a long-term LNG purchase agreement with Oman LNG for an undisclosed amount with a contract period between 2025 and 2029.
Author: JS

Title: Texas LNG secures key offtake agreement
Description: Texas LNG, a subsidiary of energy company Glenfarne Energy developing the 4 mtpa LNG export facility in Brownsville, announced a heads of agreement with an unnamed “highly experienced, investment-grade, global LNG player” for long-term LNG supply, which it said makes it sufficient to make a final investment decision.
Author: JS
